name: 1 Click PC
tag_list: pc-repair, computer-repair, ipad-repair, iphone-repair, ipod-repair, networking, it, laptop-repair
overview:
1 Click PC is a Veridian Technologies, Inc. company and provides resident and businesses of Toledo Ohio, and surrounding areas, with computer repair and networking services.

They specialize in servers, desktops, laptops, and Mac products. They are one of the only companies in the region that still work on Windows 95, 98, and 2000 computers. Of course they work on all current operating systems also.They repair iPhone’s, iPad’s, iPod’s, and all other mobile products. They manage servers remotely for multiple customers and can for you also.

Their staff can travel to a remote locations and repair problems. Their staff is also rigorously tested regularly to keep their sharpness on the ever changing world of technology. All techs are properly trained, certified, and fully capable of properly diagnosing your desktop, laptop, tablet, phone, printer, or server.
